title: Anomaly Transactions
description: Feed unstructured data and in minutes, get details of all the anomaly transactions from the ledger.

title: Business Analysis
description: Gain valuable insights on business. Get projections, analyse performance, annual statements.

title: Taxation Analysis
description: Analyse company's tax and get insights on misses and regularities.

title: Company Frauds
description: Get fraudulent activities within companies and take informed decisions.

title: Analyse Contracts
description: Are you trapped with your contracts? Are they drafted one-sided? We can help you identify them.

title: Track Contracts Deadlines
description: Tracking contracts could be haunting, we can help you identify them and send notifications.

title: Create Drafts
description: Even generating contracts are now easy with our AI solutions. Choose from our templates and be ahead of time.

title: Idemnity
description: Getting all the idemnity details from the contracts are now easy with our AI tailored solutions.

title: Legal Battles
description: Get details on all the previous legal battles and take help from our tool to generate winning arguments.

title: Notice Reconciliation
description: Reconcile and look for all the notices in one place. You do not have to visit multiple portals to track notices or miss them.

title: Notice Deadlines Tracking
description: Have notices that have deadlines, get intelligent notifications automatically so you do not have to remember them and miss the dates.

title: Tax Planning // Trial Balance
description: Do not have a hard time planning the advance tax. Upload your trial balance and get the tax details in seconds.

title: Bots & Consultancy
description: We have tailored the LLM bot to answer the most complex problems you might have. Not only you get answers to your question, we also analyse the previous case laws and give you analysis.

title: File Bots
description: Often this is needed to talk to your own file, its easy to do so. Upload your file and talk to them. Get summary and be ahead of time.

title: Track Conversion
description: Most digital business do not have traffic problems. They have conversion and retention problems. With our GDPR compliant tracker, get ahead in your business with best in class analysis.

title: Detect Revenue Leaks
description: Uncovered digital assets are difficult to find. We can help you. Convert the anlytical data to your business acumen and get revenue leakages measured.

title: Optimise Performance
description: Our consultants work with you on the identified leakages to fix them and tailor more conversion.

title: Face 1:1 Match
description: Matching face with best in class accuracy using our proprietary AI Models. We claim to have 99.87% accuracy on FDDB.

title: Face Quality Checks
description: It is important to have quality checks done on the faces, like black & white detection, non live faces (captured from printed / digital copy), face morphed etc. Our ready to use API can help you detect 15+ data points on facial images.

title: Deduplication 1:N Search
description: Want to quickly find returning faces from your database? We can help you find repeat customers of 40MM+ database in less than 1s processing time.

title: OCR
description: Extracting data from the scanned documents are now easy with our ready to use APIs.

title: Quick Onboarding
description: Our AML tools are very easy to integrate and use. APIs are accessible to add details for your customers, accounts and transactions.

title: In-Flight Suspicious Detection
description: You can use out-of-the-box rules or write your own rule to block your transactions whiel adding the transactions.

title: Scheduled Suspicious Detection
description: Rules could also be written to detect daily / weekly / monthly transaction / account or customer level data.

title: Create Case / Work on Existing
description: With each detections, the cases are created so you can track them, work on them and if needed discard. If the cases are genuine, convert them into cases.

title: Regulatory Filings
description: You can use our out-of-the-box or create your own templates to generate Rugulatory filings reports.

title: Audits & Reports
description: This is the most regulated space in the world. And we have taken extra care in ensuring that every changes are logged and audited.
